title: Intern – Paraplanning / Advice Support
aboutTheRole: At Advice Lab, you'll join a team that values growth, collaboration, and meaningful work. This internship program is designed for young motivated individuals who want hands-on experience in a people‑first environment while stepping into a career with global recognition. As an intern, you'll gain practical exposure to the Australian Financial Planning landscape, work alongside Australian Financial Advisers, and support to create accurate advice workflows and support processes. You'll develop real industry skills, understand international standards, and contribute to work that makes a genuine impact. If you take initiative, enjoy problem‑solving, and thrive in a supportive, growth‑oriented workplace, you’ll fit right in.
mustHaves: Degree in Finance, Business Management, Banking, Insurance, or International Business
Professional qualifications related to CIMA or ACCA (preferred)

whatIsParaplanning: Paraplanning is a specialized field within financial planning that focuses on research, analysis, and preparing advice documents. It plays a vital role in supporting financial advisers to deliver quality strategies that help clients achieve their financial goals.
whatIsAdviceSupport: The Advice Support internship involves assisting financial advisers with client communications, scheduling, and the preparation of basic reports and documents. It’s a great way to gain insight into the day to day operations of a financial planning practice while building practical, industry relevant skills.

paraplanning: Prepare Statements of Advice and Records of Advice within deadlines.
